baseRule.text: 若比丘。與女人獨露處坐。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 45

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer heimlich mit einer Frau – er mit ihr alleine – zusammensitzt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk sits down in private alone with a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu se sienta en privado, solo con una mujer: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。共女人獨露處坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與女人獨露處坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻獨與一苾芻尼屏處坐。者波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與女人獨屏處坐。波夜提。七十事竟
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 70

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！獨與女人露地坐者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 45

translations.text: If a monk sit alone with a woman on the open ground, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu duduk sendirian dengan seorang wanita di tempat terbuka, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘獨與女人。露地坐者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 45

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā raho nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 126

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer heimlich, zusammen mit einem Mann—sie mit ihm alleine—sitzt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni sit in private, alone with a man, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang duduk secara pribadi, sendirian dengan seorang pria, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，獨與男子露地一處共坐者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。與男子伸手內住。若耳語波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 121
